name: Gameboy (AlexVo)
description:
GAMEBOY

Is a retro-style platformer with third-person shooting elements. The game is available to play in a WEBGL browser.

The player takes on the role of a character on a mission to find a key and open a door to progress to the next level.

The player must navigate through the game's levels, avoiding obstacles and enemies, while searching for the key.  Enemies are closed in boxes, you will open a box when you will get closer to box. TIP: Sometimes key is protected by enemies in box!

Once you find the key, use it to open the door and progress to the next level.

The portal will automatically transport you to the next level.

You have only 5 lives, and if you touch an obstacle you will lose 1 life but if you will touch enemy you will instantly die. 

Use the WASD keys and cursor to move your character and the X key to shoot.

KEEP IT SHORT:

WASD - To move player

DON'T TOUCH ANYTHING - You have only 5 live!

IF YOU TOUCH BLACK ENEMY YOU WILL DIE - instantly... but you can kill them with your GUN when PRESS X.

ONE important thing

FIND A KEY AND OPEN DOOR.

Have fun and good luck on your mission!
